scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Holy Family on a journey, likely the Flight into Egypt. The Virgin Mary, seated on a donkey, cradles the Christ Child in her arms. She is dressed in a blue mantle and a white veil. Joseph, with a beard and wearing a hat, walks beside them, carrying a bundle on a stick over his shoulder. The background features a hilly landscape with trees and a distant city with towers and buildings. The entire scene is framed by an ornate, gilded architectural border with decorative elements.
